title: Amber Rudd quits as an MP after making her peace with Boris Johnson
text:
Former Cabinet minister Amber Rudd is to quit the House of Commons next week as a Conservative MP after making peace with Boris Johnson.

She said was leaving on “perfectly good terms” with the Prime Minister after resigning from the Cabinet in solidarity with 21 Conservatives who were sacked from the whip for voting to prevent a no-deal Brexit in September.

However, the former Home Secretary and Welfare and Pensions Secretary, said she was not giving up on politics for good. “I’m not finished with politics, I’m just not standing at this election,” she told the Evening Standard.

She had resigned the Tory whip at Westminster and indicated she could stand against her party in a London seat if...
description: Former Cabinet minister Amber Rudd is to quit the House of Commons next week as a Conservative MP after making peace with Boris Johnson.
